BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.
Index.hero__proof_statement__text: Klarna adds $40 Million USD to its 2024's revenue thanks to its new AI Customer Support Agent.
Index.hero__proof_statement__subtext: In 1 month, the bot has done the work of 700 human agents, outperforming them in almost every aspect.
Index.success-cases__klarna__title: Klarna boosts its revenue by $40 Million USD thanks to its new AI-powered Customer Support Agent.
Index.success-cases__klarna__highlight_1: It handles the job of 700 employees (2/3 of the customer support tickets)
Index.success-cases__klarna__highlight_2: It reduced the resolution times by 81.8%
Index.success-cases__klarna__highlight_3: Customer satisfaction was similar to its human colleagues
Index.success-cases__klarna__highlight_4: It was more precise and helpful in its responses leading to a 25% drop in repeat inquiries
Index.success-cases__klarna__closure: ... IN JUST ONE MONTH!. These results are from integrating an AI Chatbot (with limited capabilities) in one single company. Imagine what can we do for you with even far more advanced solutions.
Index.hero__subHeading_5: in a fraction of the time and cost.

CallMeDialog.title: Call me for a demo (~7 mins)
CallMeDialog.description: Our Customer Care Representative will call you today to showcase a quick demo and let you know some potential areas where AI Agents can boost your business results by saving time and money or generating more revenue opportunities.
CallMeDialog.notValidCallMeNowForm: Please, make sure you've entered valid data in the form and checked-on the box about the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

TermsAcceptance.privacy_policy: Privacy Policy, Cookies and how my personal data will be handled

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach. Garnered favorable responses from event attendees, resulting in a successful event with heightened participant engagement and increased brand visibility.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
